item.title: Healthy Ice Cream Alternatives
item.description:
[caption id="attachment_988" align="alignright" width="300" caption="jessicafm on Flickr"][/caption]

"You scream, I scream, we all scream for ice cream!" - American Proverb

Ice cream is probably the greatest food ever invented by humankind. But it is also probably one of the least healthy. It is basically milk and sugar, plus any flavorings and toppings. Of course, ice cream isn't meant to be healthy, so it should be an occasional treat, but sometimes you just have a craving for it when you know you can't or shouldn't break out the scoop and fudge sauce.

item.title: My Paleo Journey
item.description: My gym's 30 Day Paleo Challenge has come to an end, though I know many of us will continue to stick to the diet, having seen a lot of progress in the last month. A number of my fellow CrossFitters didn't make it all the way though. The same attitude that gets them through grueling workouts is now making them very frustrated with themselves and their perceived inability to stick to a simple diet plan. They can't understand why a slice of toast is more difficult to overcome than a 250lb barbell.
